means: 提名…为候选人( nominate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She has been nominated for the presidency.
sentence.Network_cn: 她已经获得了董事长职位的提名。

sentence.Network_en: The movie was nominated for an Oscar.
sentence.Network_cn: 这部电影获奥斯卡金像奖提名。

sentence.Network_en: The President nominated me his representative at the meeting.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统任命我为他的代表出席会议.

常用机械英语词汇积累 - 彭斌 - 博客园 ... stroke： 行程 nominal： 标称的,额定 nominal stroke： 额定行程.
4，唯名论（nominalism）和多义性（polysemy）研究的观点。这方面的研究主要是对反映意识形态的流通符号，进行内在涵义的分析。

entry.def: If someone is nominated for a job or position, their name is formally suggested as a candidate for it.

example.ex: Under party rules each candidate has to be nominated by 55 Labour MPs...
example.tran: 根据党章，每个候选人必须得到55名工党下院议员的提名。

example.ex: The public will be able to nominate candidates for awards such as the MBE.
example.tran: 公众将可以推荐诸如英帝国勋章之类的奖项的候选人。

entry.def: If you nominate someone to a job or position, you formally choose them to hold that job or position.

example.ex: Voters will choose fifty of the seventy five deputies. The Emir will nominate the rest...
example.tran: 选民将选出75名代表中的50名，其余代表由埃米尔任命。

example.ex: The EU would nominate two members to the committee...
example.tran: 欧盟将为该委员会指定两名成员。

entry.def: If someone or something such as an actor or a film is nominated for an award, someone formally suggests that they should be given that award.

example.ex: Practically every movie he made was nominated for an Oscar.
example.tran: 他执导的影片几乎每部都获得过奥斯卡奖提名。

example.ex: ...a campaign to nominate the twice World Champion as Sports Personality of the Year.
example.tran: 提名那位两届世界冠军获得者为年度体育人物的拉票活动
